document_data.caption: ''Marten under the effects of [[speak with dead]].''
document_data.name: Marten
document_data.mainbody: '''Marten''' was a toll collector who lived and worked on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had gray-white hair that he worn nealy brushed back.
document_data.History: Marten was killed in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, when [[goblin]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists]] of [[the Absolute]] raided the tollhouse at which he worked. Marten, [[Vance (toll collector)|Vance]], and their fellows were abandoned by the tollhouse's guards. They attempted to flee and hide, but were ultimately cut down.
